messages.subject: new/old member
messages.msgSnippet: Hi to all! I am just jumping in here. My name is Nancy, I used to belong to this group, but quit almost all my online activities earlier this year because my
messages.messageBody:
Hi to all! I am just jumping in here. My name is Nancy, I used to belong to
this group, but quit almost all my online activities earlier this year because
my dh was having medical problems and we were in some dire straits
financially. Things are better now! Anyway, for those of you who don't know me, or don't
remember me, I have been at home with my kids for years now. We have always
unschooled, never used curriculums. Moly's kindergarten year reminded me why I
hated school so much and we decided we couldn't do any worse. So far no one has
complained, and in our house that is something! So as long as that continues
we will too. :o)

Moly is 9 and Jack is 7. Darin and I have been married over ten years now.
Moly wants to be either a doctor or a veterinarian, but mostly a vet. Most of
her activities revolve around animals. She collects food and other things for
Stone Nature Center, she reads books upon books about all sorts of animals, and
she is trying to find a vet who will let her volunteer in his office. Jack
wants to be a movie star and I think if anyone can be a star, he can! It's like
living with Robin Williams, Andy Kaufman, and Jim Carey in one person. He says
when he becomes a star, he is going to buy me a house in Malibu and a tank.
"Wouldn't you like to drive a tank Mom? It would be lots of fun to crush stuff!"
That's my boy! <bwg>

~Nancy



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
